item.title: ApacheConNA: Meet the indian tribe
item.description: ApacheConNA: Meet the indian tribe # ApacheCon is the ``User Conference of the Apache Software Foundation’’. What should that mean? If you are going to Apache Con you have the chance of meeting committers of your favourite projects as well as members of the foundation itself. Though there are a lot of talks that are interesting from a technical point of view the goal really is to turn you into an active member of the
